text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-1059 (Deemed Approved December 15, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4761

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
October 7,
2014

To approve the proposed rules to amend Title 12 (D.C. Construction Codes Supplement of 2013) of the
District of Columbia Municipal Regulations.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the “Construction Codes Amendment Approval Resolution of 2014”.
Sec. 2. Pursuant to Section 10 of the Construction Codes Approval and Amendments Act
of 1986, effective March 21, 1987 (D.C. Law 6-216; D.C. Official Code § 6-1409), the Council
approves the proposed rules, published at 61 DCR 4760, to amend Title 12 of the District of
Columbia Municipal Regulations.
Sec. 3. The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement contained in the committee report
as the fiscal impact statement required by section 603(c)(3) of the District of Columbia Home
Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code § 1-206.02(c)(3)).
Sec. 4. The Secretary of the Council shall transmit a copy of this resolution, upon its
adoption, to the Director of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs.
Sec. 5. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Construction
Codes
Amendment
Approval
Resolution of
2014
